contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1971 D Weston-super-Mare (Championship Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-championship-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK 1st prize - The Alderman Couch Trophy and 31.50 2nd prize - The Howard Motors Trophy and 15.75 3rd prize - The Payne and Holder Shield and 10.50
Quaint to note that the prize money is the decimal equivalent of last years "Guinea" amounts!
